data.name: ListFile
data.description: Lists all files in a specified directory.
data.function: codebolt.fs.listFile(folderPath: string, isRecursive: boolean, listFiles?: boolean)
data.input_variable_description: The folderPath parameter specifies the directory path, isRecursive determines if subdirectories are included, and listFiles is an optional enhanced mode.
data.raw_content: Lists all files in a specified directory with optional recursive listing and enhanced mode.
